source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Excel 2016 Intermediate
items.headline: Expand your Excel abilities with charts, outlines, workbooks and much more.
objectives_summary: Custom Excel
Link Workbooks and Worksheets
Work with Range Names

items.title: The Ultimate Microsoft Access 2010 and 2013 Training Bundle
items.headline: The Most Convenient Way to Boost Your Confidence And Learn MS Access Inside And Out—Quickly, No Travel or Classes.
objectives_summary: Essential training for Microsoft Access 2010
Essential training for Microsoft Access 2013
Advanced training for Microsoft Access 2010

items.title: Excel 2010 VBA
items.headline: This course introduces the user to Excel 2010 macro programming using Microsoft’s Visual Basic for Application (VBA).
objectives_summary: This course will introduces the user to Excel 2010 macro programming using Microsoft’s Visual Basic for Application (VBA)

items.title: Advanced Excel Power Query-M language, troubleshoot, Pattern

items.headline: Learn more about Power Query M Language, ready-made patterns, advanced real life case studies, solution to PQ limitation
objectives_summary: You will be introduced about various core M Language concepts
You will apply learning to real life datasets.

items.title: Microsoft Access VBA, Design and Advanced Methods Workshop 2
items.headline: Learn new secrets to creating awesome Microsoft Access databases and VBA coding not covered in any of my other courses!
objectives_summary: Perform several advanced Microsoft Access VBA techniques that will enable them to create more robust database systems

items.title: The Ultimate Microsoft Project 2010 Training Course 17 Hours
items.headline: Master project management faster than you ever thought possible with this 17-hour course for Microsoft Project 2010.
objectives_summary: Efficiently use schedules, calendars, and critical paths.
Explore cost management features such as defining/tracking costs and reporting options.
Use tools to plan, manage, and collaborate with other people and teams.

items.title: PowerPoint 2013 Microsoft Office Specialist Certification

visible_instructors.name: Syed
visible_instructors.title: Syed Raza
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Enterprise Architect, 7x AWS, PhD

items.headline: In this complete course students will learn Microsoft PowerPoint 2013 and how to receive your Specialist Certification
objectives_summary: Work confidently with PowerPoint 2013
Possibly obtain the Microsoft Office Specialist credentials
Create and deliver powerful presentations

items.title: Introduction to Microsoft Word 2016
items.headline: Learn to master Microsoft Word 2016 using step-by-step instructions
objectives_summary: Familiarize yourself with the most common functions of Microsoft Word 2016
Learn to create many types of documents in Microsoft Word 2016
Learn to make full use of Microsoft Word 2016

items.title: Excel XML, XPath and XSLT Workflows
items.headline: Extend your advanced Excel skills with XML and XSLT processing
objectives_summary: You will learn the basics of XML and the role played by DTDs and schema documents in XML validation.
You will learn how to import and export XML data into and out of Microsoft Excel.
You will learn how to use XML mapping to target specific parts of the XML documents you are importing.

items.title: Master Microsoft Excel, Outlook and Word 2013 - 26 Hours
items.headline: The Most Convenient Way to Boost Your Confidence And Learn MS Office 2013 Inside And Out—Quickly, No Travel or Classes.
objectives_summary: Data entry, cell formatting, working with multiple worksheets and the “Ribbon” interface.
Tips for mouse and touch screen users.
Graphs and charts using templates or custom designs.

Discover how to work with costs, deadlines, and overcome scheduling issues
